With her first loan of KES 40,000 from KADET LTD, Mauline plans to restock her shop with assorted household items. The profits will be invested back into the business. Mauline's dream for the future is to improve her family's living standards.

loans.use: To purchase home items and appliances.

loans.name: Delcy Roxana

texts.es: La Sra. Delcy tiene 28 años, tiene un hijo de la edad de  6 meses, la Sra. Delcy se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa de segunda mano en su puesto de venta que se encuentra en la populosa feria de la zona 16 de julio, escoge las mejores prendas de los fardos, las lava, las plancha y las embolsa para venderlas a mayor precio en otras ferias de la ciudad de La Paz,  Este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Delcy va a usar este préstamo para la compra de fardos de ropa al por mayor ya que  necesita  capital por estas fechas de  fin de año ya que es en esta época cuando la gente compra ropa para la familia, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital, la Sra. Delcy  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son La cliente tiene mucha competencia y el tener que salir temprano a la compra de ropa y  va a utilizar los beneficios en la compra de variedad ropa como chamarras, blusas, chompas polares de primera calidad para que pueda promocionarlos a sus clientes como regalos en las fiestas de fin de año, su deseo de la Sra. Delcy es tener una tienda propia de ropa, tanto ropa de segunda mano como tambien ropa nueva y así contribuir como mujer al progreso económico de su familia.
texts.en:
Delcy is 28 years old and she has a 6-month-old son.  Delcy makes a living buying and selling second-hand clothes in her sales stall that is located in the populated market of the "16 de Julio" area.  She chooses the best garments by the bale and she washes them, irons them and bags them to sell at a higher price in other markets of the city of La Paz.

This loan is her first sequence within the institution.  Delcy is going to use this loan to purchase bales of wholesale clothing.  She needs capital for these dates at the end of the year since it is at this time when people buy clothes for the family.  Her reason for requesting this loan is the lack of capital.  Delcy faces challenges in her business such as the fact that the customer has a lot of competition and one has to go out early to purchase the clothes.  She is going to use the profits to purchase various clothing such as jackets, blouses and polar sweaters of the first quality so that she can promote them to her clients as gifts for the holidays at the end of the year.  

Delcy's desire is to have her own store of secondhand clothing as well as new clothing and in this way contribute as a woman to the economic progress of her family.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothing.

loans.name: Ulmaskhon

texts.ru: Улмасхон 49 лет, родилась и выросла в Селе Марказ, Баткенской области. У Улмасхон один сын. Ему 26 лет. Муж Улмасхон помогает в ведении бизнеса. В течении многих лет основным источником дохода для семьи Улмасхон является садоводство. Семья выращивает и продает саженцы. Они начали свой бизнес с 20,000 сом. Сын Улмасхон помогает ей в ведении бизнеса, так как он хорошо освоил садоводство, он вовремя удобряет и обрабатывает деревья. У заемщицы имеется 0,2га земли, где находятся сады. Помимо сада в хозяйстве Улмасхон есть скотина. Ежемесячный доход Улмасхон составляет 5,000 сом. Улмасхон Обратилась в «Бай Тушум и партнеры» в второй раз, все кредиты она использовала для расширения и развитие бизнеса. В этот раз она запросила 100,000 сом. На полученные деньги она хочет закупить землю, семена и минеральные химикаты для удобрения земли в целях увеличения площади сада. По своему характеру Улмасхон очень спокойная и ответственная женщина. Результаты и состояние хозяйства заемщицы говорит о её трудолюбии. Улмасхон рассказала что главной целью жизни считает будущее сына и его семьи. Она старается делать все что бы у её сына и внуков в жизни было хорошо. На вырученные средства Улмасхан собирается расширять свой бизнес.
texts.en:
Ulmaskhon is 49 years old.  She was born and raised in the village of Markaz, in the Batken province.  She has one son, age 26.

Ulmaskhon's husband helps her with her business.  For many years, the main source of income for Ulmaskhon's family has been horticulture.  The family cultivates and sells seedlings, a business they started with a capital of 20,000 som.  Ulmaskhon's son is also involved in the business, as he has become a skilled gardener.  He applies fertilizers to the trees when it is time to do so, and he also treats them.

The borrower owns 0.2 hectare (0.49 acres) of orchard land.  She also owns some livestock and makes a monthly income of 5,000 som.  It is the second time that she is applying for a loan from "Bai Tushum & Partners".  She uses all her loans to expand and develop her business.   This time, she is requesting a loan of 100,000 som, which will be used to buy land, seeds and mineral fertilizers.  Her goal is to increase the surface area of her land.

Ulmaskhon is, by nature, a very calm and responsible woman.  Her success in developing her horticultural business shows proof of her devotion to her work.  She says that her main goal in life is to ensure a good future for her son and his family. She is trying to do everything so that her son and grandchildren can enjoy a good life.  She plans to use her earnings to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy land and young plants.

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es:
Claudia, necesita un crédito para la compra de materiales para la venta de tamales y de pupusas, comprándose maíz, pollo, condimentos, hoja para envolver los tamales, también comprara quesillo, chicharrón y repollo, para la elaboración de las pupusas.
Con el préstamo anterior considera que le ayudo a fortalecer su capital para aumentar el negocio, actualmente ella además de realizar las ventas sale a prestar el servicio en lavar roa y planchar.
texts.en:
Claudia needs a loan to buy the ingredients for the sale of her tamales and stuffed tortillas.  She will buy corn, chicken, condiments, and banana leaves to roll up her tamales.  She will also buy a soft cheese called Quesillo, mashed cooked pork meat, and cabbage to use in her stuffed tortillas.

She thinks that her past loan helped to strengthen her capital and to increase her business.  In addition to her food sales, she currently offers services in washing clothes and ironing.

loans.use: to buy corn, chicken, condiments, banana leaves, soft cheese, mashed cooked pork meat, and cabbage.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy phone sets and mobile cards for her son's Public Call Office business

loans.name: Mamuka

texts.en:
Mamuka, 42 years old, is from the Tskaltubo district of West Georgia, where he lives with his wife, parents and two children. Mamuka’s parents are provided with a retirement pension. The family is involved in an agricultural business. In particular, they run a small dairy farm of one calf and 2 cows, whose milk is used in cheese products. The cheese is sold at the local open market. Mamuka also grows maize and nuts on the family-owned land and sells the harvested products for a good price. The family has a pig and sells piglets seasonally. Mamuka also works locally as an artisan, earning a service fee.

According to the government’s estimation, the family belongs to the vulnerable poor category and gets a pension from the local government. Mamuka wants to make some improvements and repairs to his old house but does not have enough money to do so. Therefore, he is requesting a loan to cover the costs of house repairs, such as changing windows, painting, etc. This loan will enable Mamuka and his family to have suitable home conditions and to enjoy living in their house.

loans.use: to renovate the house

loans.name: Jostina

texts.en:
Jostina, 49 years old, is married and blessed with four children aged 24, 18, 14 and 10. She has owned a grocery store for five years, earning a monthly income of KES 30,000.

Jostina is servicing her third  loan of KES 60,000 from KADET LTD, having repaid the previous loans successfully. She intends to use the loan to purchase vegetables, dry beans and maize for resale. The profit from this loan will be used to pay school fees for school going children. Jostina hopes to improve her family's living standards.

loans.use: To purchase dry maize, beans and vegetables

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase cloth to sell.

loans.name: Liza

texts.en: Liza's main source of income comes from planting and harvesting corn for sale. She is 38 years old, married and has 2 children. She is from Kinuman Norte, Ozamiz City and has been in farming for 4 years, earning an income of PHP 3,000 a month. Liza joined GDMPC in 2011. Liza is requesting a loan of PHP 5,500 which will be used to purchase fertilizers such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure.

loans.name: Khoa

texts.en:
Khoa is 27 years old and is single. He lives with his family in Ho Chi Minh City. He has run a general store at his house for five years. He sells milk, beverages, stationery, confectionery and intends to use his loan to buy many kinds of products to sell, such as eggs, sugar, and sanitation items.

He hopes his business runs smoothly and will help him to improve his family's living conditions and save money for his family's future.

loans.use: to buy many kinds of products to sell, such as eggs, sugar and sanitation items.

loans.name: Lina

texts.en:
Lina is a 47-year-old married woman and mother of four children. She has been working selling gifts, accessories and perfumes since 1975. Lina is a hard worker who developed her business gradually over the years. Her customers are loyal to her, and insist on supporting her through their loyalty. Her son and husband help her by taking turns staying at the shop so she can go home early to take care of her other family members, through preparing food and reviewing her children's lessons if requested.

Lina is applying for a loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua, in order to increase her business capital with special Christmas gifts and gadgets. This is Lina's second cycle as Al Majmoua borrower; her previous loan helped a lot in increasing her business capital and improving her living situation. She hopes to keep responding to customers' needs and developing her business.

loans.use: To increase her business capital with special Christmas gifts and gadgets.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is 59 years old and married with five children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Norma is borrowing PHP 27000 through NWTF to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Norma has been raising pigs for eight years and also earns additional income from buying and selling rice grains and farming sugarcane. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Rhodora

texts.en:
Rhodora is 49 years old and married with six children. She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines. Rhodora is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to purchase additional livestock to raise.

Rhodora has been raising livestock for five years and also earns additional income from food vending and farming sugarcane. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock to raise.

loans.name: Hurelbaatar

texts.en:
Hurelbaatar, 45 years old, lives with her husband and 3 children in a small house in the Orhon province of Mongolia. Her husband, Tserendavaa, aged 45, works with her in her organic vegetable production and sales business. Her oldest daughter, Puntsagnyam, aged 22, works at a private pharmacy company and her younger two children, Myagmarjargal and Buyanjargal, aged 20 and 16, are university students.

Hurelbaatar has been operating an organic vegetable production and sales business for 16 years and has gained lots of experience. She and her husband grow, harvest, reserve and produce various types of organic vegetable products by themselves. Hurelbaatar is famous among customers for her organic, high quality vegetable products. She is now requesting a loan of 6,500,000 MNT to purchase seeds for her organic vegetable production and sales business and to build a storage pit to keep the organic vegetables fresh for customers. Hurelbaatar is a hardworking and responsible woman who says, "I teach my children how to grow and harvest organic vegetables and how to produce canned or reserved products from the vegetables. I want my children to be grown with highly educated and hardworking people."

loans.use: to purchase seeds for her organic vegetable production and sales business

loans.name: Edilyn

texts.en:
Edilyn works hard to support one child. She is married and has fruit-selling business in the Philippines.

Edilyn has requested a PHP 4,600 loan through NWTF to buy a solar lamp. She is getting the solar lamp because she wants to save money by minimizing her kerosene expenses. Edilyn is aware that by using the solar lamp, she is not only saving money, she is also helping the environment and reducing health and hazard risks to her family.

loans.use: to purchase a solar lamp

loans.name: Lhamsuren

texts.en:
Mrs. Lhamsuren is a 71-year-old widow lives with her niece in small house in the Arkhangai province of Mongolia. 

She has been operating an organic dairy products sales business since 1998. She has built strong customer and supplier base. She has 2-3 loyal suppliers who sells organic dairy products only to her at a lower price. She has obtained lot of experience in dairy products sales business. She is planning to purchase large amount of organic dairy products and sell during winter and beginning of spring--a time when dairy production reaches the lowest point of the year and price reaches the highest point of the year. She is now requesting 3,000.000 MNT to purchase large amount of organic dairy products to sell during winter and beginning of spring.

loans.use: to purchase large amount of organic dairy products to sell during winter and beginning of spring

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is married with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Lydia is 49 years old and two of her children are in school.

Lydia has a buy and sell vegetables business in the Philippines. Lydia requested a PHP 17,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional vegetables to sell.

Lydia has been in this business for 13 years. In the future, Lydia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional vegetables to sell

loans.name: Bintihamisi

texts.en:
Binti is 26 years old, single, and lives with her parents . She is responsible and hardworking. Binti makes a living selling clothes. She sells her products by going door to door in various neighborhoods. To make the most of her week, she visits a different neighborhood each day to gain more customers.

Binti is requesting a loan from Yehu, which she will use to buy a bigger variety of clothing and styles so that she will be able to fill the orders of her customers.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of clothing and styles.

loans.name: Eva Bella

texts.en:
Eva Bella works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Eva Bella is borrowing 4,600 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy a solar lamp. She is getting the solar lamp because she wants to save money by minimizing her kerosene expenses.

Eva Bella is aware that by using the solar lamp, she is saving money, helping the environment, and reducing health and hazard risks to her family.

loans.use: to purchase a solar lamp.

loans.name: Jose Roberto

texts.es:
José, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo, porque considera que el anterior le ayudo a realizar su trabajo, actualmente invertirá en el pago de mano de obra,  para la recolección  de  de cosecha de arroz, la cual tiene sembrada en una manzana de terreno.
El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior considera que aumento la cosecha de granos básicos, para comercializarla en el mercado, en su familia el número de miembros se mantiene, pero con el préstamo sus ingresos mejoraron.
texts.en: Jose decided to request a new loan; he believes the previous one helped him get his work done, he will now invest it in paying for labor to harvest rice, which he has growing in a piece of land.  The effect that he had with the previous loan increased the harvest of basic grains to sell them at the market, the number of family members is the same but with the loan his revenue improved.

loans.use: to pay for labor to harvest rice.

loans.name: Jeremia Miguel

texts.es:
El señor Jeremia Miguel esta soltero, tiene 19 años de edad, cursó la educacion diversificada, graduado en dibujo en construcción, se dedica a la topografía, siendo auxiliar para una entidad que construye viviendas, inicio este trabajo para poder contar con ingresos, y hasta el momento lleva 3 años de experiencia.

Solicita un crédito que lo utilizara para la compra de útiles necesarios para la a realización de planos, y maquetas para la construcción de viviendas, espera seguir mejorando y en el futuro tener estudios de arquitectura.
texts.en:
Jeremia Miguel is single and 19 years old. He studied in a Diversified Education program graduating in Construction Drawing. He works in topography as an assistant in a company that builds houses. He started this work to earn an income and has earned three years of experience.

He will use the loan to buy the necessary materials for drawing up design plans and small-scale models used for building houses. He hopes to continue improving and to study architecture in the future.

loans.use: to buy materials for design plans and small-scale models.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
As a married mother of four children, Jocelyn works hard to support her family.  She has a home products sales business in the Philippines.  She earns additional income from a general store and pig fattening.  

Jocelyn is requesting her fourteenth loan from NWTF for 15,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase more curtains, towels etc. to sell to her customers. Jocelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 13 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can rent a space at the public market.

loans.use: to purchase curtains, towels, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en: Rosie, 67 years old, is married and has three children who are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. For the past 20 years, Rosie has operated a general store business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional items such as sardines, eggs, spices, etc. to sell. In the future, Rosie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items such as sardines, eggs, spices, etc. to sell

loans.name: Evaristo

texts.es: El Sr. Evaristo tiene 53 años casado con un hijo de las edades de 19 años, el  se dedica a la Agricultura sembrando variedad de vegetales como también papa y yuca y maíz y maní en su parcela que se encuentra en la comunidad de  Camiri,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  el Sr. Evaristo va a utilizar  este préstamo para la siembra de maní y lo que implica el preparado de la tierra, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es para obtener recursos  para la siembra y poder subsistir, el Sr. Evaristo enfrenta retos en su negocio que son las inclemencias del clima que en muchas ocasiones arruinan los sembradíos,  y utilizara los beneficios Para mejorara la calidad de vida del cliente y de su familia ya que el corre con todos los gastos del hogar, es una persona  responsable y trabajador se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Evaristo is 53 years old. He is married and has a 19-year-old son. He makes a living as a farmer, growing a variety of crops such as potatoes, yuca (a root vegetable), corn, and peanuts. His land is located in the community of Camiri.

This is Evaristo's second loan with this lending institution. He will use it to help him prepare his land and plant peanuts. He is requesting this loan to be able to obtain resources for planting and to make ends meet when facing challenges such as unfavorable weather that can ruin his crops.

Evaristo will use his profits to improve his family's quality of life and to pay his household expenses. He is a responsible and hardworking person who is very grateful for the help this lending institution offers him.

loans.use: to plant peanuts.

loans.name: Bebian

texts.en: Bebian is from Poblacion 1, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 54 years old. Bebian is married and has two children. To make a living, Bebian sells fish in the local community. Bebian has been in fish vending for 5 years and earns 10,000 PHP a month for these activities. In 2011, Bebian joined GDMPC. Bebian is requesting a loan of 18,500 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional fish to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell

loans.name: Julia Dominga

texts.es:
La señora Julia Dominga esta casada, tiene 57 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 8 hijos de los cuales 3 están estudiando, se dedica a la tejeduría de cortes típicos, inicio este trabajo siendo operaria y hasta el momento lleva 4 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la albañilería.

solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos de diferente colores, pera el tejido de cortes ya que espera incrementar su volumen de producción y tener mas posibilidades de vender. Espera en el futuro tener capital amplio y poder tener empleados en su negocio.
texts.en:
Julia Dominga is 57 years old and married. She didn’t have the opportunity to go to school. Of her eight children, three go to school. She is a weaver of traditional outfits. She started this business when she was a laborer and now has 4 years of experience. She counts on the support of her husband who is a bricklayer.

She is requesting a loan that she will use to buy different colored threads for weaving outfits, as she hopes to increase the volume of production and have more opportunities to sell. She hopes that in the future she’ll have lots of capital and she’ll be able to hire some employees for her business.

loans.use: buy thread to weave traditional outfits.

loans.name: Huong

texts.en:
Huong is a 37-year-old married woman. She lives with three sons and her husband in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns money by selling sewing machines. For two years, she has run a food stall to sell food and meals to people in her community.

Huong would like a loan to purchase better-quality food and to repair her stall. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her customers and to attract additional customers. 

She also hopes that through her loan she will be able to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties facing her family.

loans.use: To purchase better-quality food and to repair her food stall.

loans.name: Zabaida

texts.en:
Ms. Zabaida is a 46-year-old married woman and a mother of three. She has had a business selling vegetables for four years. The man shown in the photo is Zabaida’s husband.  Four years back when her husband was laid off from his job, they faced much trouble in managing the financials of their home. They began to think and after careful observation and seeing the trend of the community they decided to open a vegetable shop outside their home. Both Zabaida and her husband manage to give proper time to their customers by keeping the shop open into the evening. The customers are impressed by their polite behavior and whenever they have to buy the vegetables, they come to their shop. 

Kashf played a vital role in starting of their business. At an early stage before the business was established, Kashf gave them loan to meet their financial needs. Now they are in their 5th loan cycle with Kashf, exhibiting good repayment behavior. Now they require an amount of 45,000 Rs so that they can buy more stock of fresh vegetables from market at wholesale rates. She will spend the profit providing a better and more prosperous future to her children.

loans.use: to buy more stock of  fresh vegetables from the market at wholesale rates.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy medicines for her husband's medicine-selling business

loans.name: Buena Vida Group

texts.es: Socios microempresarios formado por tres integrantes uno de ellos que es Dulce se dedica a la venta de chiverías, golosinas y venta de ropa actividad que tiene 4 años de estar en esa actividad es madre soltera con tres hijos menores de edad que se encarga de su educación y manutención el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de ropa variada, de adultos y niños, compra de golosinas etc. Domingo brinda servicio de moto taxis en el municipio además con su esposa vende pinolillo, pinol blanco como apoyo a la economía del hogar y Raquel vende cosméticos de la Avon, Zermat y golosinas en sus domicilio.
texts.en: This group consists of three micro-entrepreneurs: one of them is Dulce who has been selling snacks, sweets, and clothing for the past 4 years. She is a single mother with three underage children. She's responsible for their education and well-being. She will use the loan to buy an assortment of adult & child clothing and snacks.  Domingo, another member, provides motorcycle taxi service in his municipality with his wife, who sells a drink made with cornstarch and water (pinolillo) to help support the household. Raquel, the third member, sells Avon and Zermat cosmetics along with snacks from her house.

loans.use: to buy snacks and an assortment of adult and child clothing.

loans.name: Maxima

texts.es: La Sra. Máxima tiene 53 años y tiene 1 hijo  de la edad de 15 años, ella vive en la localidad de Camiri,  la Sra. Máxima se dedica a la venta de variedad de artículos de primera necesidad en su tienda de barrio que se encuentra en la misma zona donde vive,  este préstamo es su primera  secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Máxima va a usar este préstamo para la compra variedad de abarrotes al por mayor  y  de esta manera brindar variedad de productos a sus clientes,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, la Sra. Máxima va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando productos y así mejorando sus ingresos, su deseo para su negocio es tener un almacén y así brindar un  mejor servicio a su clientela.
texts.en: Máxima is a 53-year-old mother of a 15-year-old boy. She lives in the town of Camiri. Máxima sells a variety of basic need articles in her corner store, which is in the same area as where she lives. This is her first loan with the institution. Máxima will use this loan to buy a variety of wholesale groceries so she can offer her clients a variety of products. Her reason for requesting this loan is to continue improving her business. Máxima will use the loan to continue buying products and that way increase her earnings. The dream for her business is to have a supermarket so she can offer her clients better service.

loans.use: buy a variety of products in bulk.

loans.name: Prudencia Eneyda

texts.es:
esta clienta tiene más de 20 años de experiencia como comerciante y siempre ha mantenido a su familia de la venta de ropa, desde hace 10 años quedo viuda y desde entonces ha tenido que redoblar esfuerzos en su negocio para mantener a su 2 hijos los cuales están en la universidad y para  los gastos de la casa.
En cuanto al crédito lo necesita para la compra de mercadería ya que se aproxima la temporada buena para las buenas ventas.
texts.en:
This client has almost 20 years' experience as a merchant. She has always supported her family through selling clothing. She was widowed ten years ago. Since then, she has had to double her work at her business in order to support her two children, who are in university, and to cover the household costs. 
She needs this loan for the purchase of merchandise, since the season of good sales is coming up.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as children's clothing for her business.

loans.name: Norman Javier

texts.es:
El señor  Norman tiene la edad de 51 años, es casado y tiene 3 hijos de los cuales únicamente solo uno está a su cargo.
 El es Arquitecto y labora como jefe de departamento de catastro desde hace 18 meses en donde se encarga en dar seguimiento a los impuestos de bienes e inmuebles y dar seguimiento al desarrollo urbano y turistico de la ciudad.

Es una persona emprendedora y con deseos de superación, solicita un crédito  a ceprodel para la compra de  materiales de construccion), zinc, cemento, bloques, arena perlines. para  mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Norman is 51 years old, married, and has three children, one of which is still in his care. He works as an architect and became the head of the land registry department 18 months ago. It is his job to follow up on personal and property taxes as well as monitor urban development and tourism in his city.

Norman is an enterprising man with the desire to excel. He is requesting a loan from Ceprodel to buy construction supplies: zinc, cement, cinder blocks, sand, purline, etc. for personal use in order to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as zinc, cement, cinder blocks, sand, purline, etc. for personal use.

loans.name: Prode Group

texts.es:
María pertenece al grupo Prode
 María de 41 años  es soltera y tiene 02 hijos, actualmente vive con su hijo menor al que apoya económicamente. María empezó su negocio hace 15 años, gracias a la ayuda de su hermano, actualmente ella tiene un puesto en el mercado de su zona, donde trabaja por las mañanas atendiendo a su clientela que acude a su puesto en busca de carne fresca. Por otro lado en  las tardes se dedica a otro  negocio que tiene en su casa una la librería bazar que ha inaugurado hace 01 año, allí vende todo tipo de útiles escolares y regalos el préstamo que EDAPROSPO le ha otorgado será de mucha utilidad porque quiere comprar juguetes para las fiestas navideñas, su mayor sueño en la vida es ampliar su negocio y seguir invirtiendo en mercadería para poder atender a mas clientes.
María agradece el apoyo de los inversionistas KIVA porque hacen su sueño realidad.
*María esta vestida con chompa a rayas rojo y plomo.
texts.en:
María is part of the group “Prode".
María is a single, 41-year-old mother of 2 children. She currently lives with her youngest son, whom she supports financially. María started her business 15 years ago, thanks to her brother’s help. She has a kiosk in the local market where she works every morning, attending to her clientele who come to her looking for fresh meat. In addition, in the afternoons she runs another business from her house: a library bazar that she inaugurated one year ago. There she sells all sorts of school supplies and gifts. The loan she has requested from EDAPROSPO will be of much use to her because she wants to buy toys for the Christmas season. Her biggest wish in her life is to expand her business and continue investing in merchandise so she can serve more clients.
María is thankful for the support she has received from the KIVA investors because they make her dream a reality.
*María is wearing a red and grey striped sweater.

loans.use: buy toys.

loans.name: Lucesita Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por cuatros socias una de ellas es Aminta mujer soltera de 48 años con un hijo menor que le acompaña en la compra y comercialización del producto, vende zapatos de cueros hechos en Masaya desde hace 4 años el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de zapatos al por mayor, Maricela de 36 años vende fritanga, refresco en su domicilio, Virginia vende productos de lo Zelsa y prendas de Zafiro, Ericka vende cosméticos, maquillajes, cremas y shampoo.
texts.en: This communal bank is made up of 4 members.  One of these is Aminta, a single, 48 year-old woman, who has a minor child who goes with her to buy and sell her products.  She's been selling leather shoes in Masaya for 4 years.  She will invest this loan in the purchase of shoes at wholesale.  Maricela, 36, sells fried foods and drinks from her home, Virginia sells Zelsa brand products (cosmetics) and Zafiro brand garments, and Ericka sells cosmetics, makeup, creams and shampoo.

loans.use: to buy leather shoes

loans.name: Anwer

texts.en:
Ms. Anwer is a 45-year-old married woman and a mother of four children. She runs a small general store at the corner of her house with the support of her husband. The man shown in the photo is Anwer’s husband. Her husband also assists her in buying stock of goods from the market at lower rates. 

The couple has retained many regular customers who prefer to come to their store on a daily basis. It has been eight years since they started running their business for the sake of their family members. 

For the growth of their business, Anwer has requested a loan of PKR 25,000 to buy stock of rice, flour and beverages from the market at lower rates. They then will be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. She wishes to utilize part of the revenue to renovate her house and provide a quality education to her children.

loans.use: To buy stock of rice, flour and beverages from the market at lower rates.

loans.name: Oanh

texts.en:
Oanh is 55 years old and is widowed. She has been running a business that sells and rents wedding clothes and wedding accessories for ten years. She started this business to cover her expenses and to raise her five children. She lives in Ho Chi Minh City.

Oanh is requesting a loan to expand her business by offering more kinds of wedding clothes and accessories to better meet her customers' needs. She will use the loan to buy and make more wedding clothes and accessories to rent and sell.

She hopes that through the loan she will be able to expand her business activities and have money to reinvest in her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy and make more wedding clothes and accessories to rent and sell from her store.

loans.name: Analita

texts.en:
Analita is 39 years old and married with four children. Three of them are currently in school. Analita works very hard to provide for them.

Analita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 26,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock like canned goods, spices, soft drinks, eggs, spices, etc. to sell.

Analita has been in this business for five years.

In the future, Analita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stock like canned goods, spices, and soft drinks to sell.

loans.name: Shamsiya

texts.en:
Shamsiya is a 52-year-old married woman and the mother of five sons and daughters. 

She has a small food market, from which she is supporting the family and paying some of the household bills. She has now applied for this loan in order to bring in more goods and food products to the store to increase her profits.

loans.use: to bring in more goods and food products.

loans.name: Bunafsha

texts.ru: Бунафша очень красивая и трудолюбивая девушка. Ей 21 года, не замужем и живет с родителями. С ранних лет она имела большой интерес шитью и кройки. Она шила разные одежды для своей куклы и повзрослев, она обучилась на курсе шитья и кройки и теперь шьет одежды для женщин. Она планирует организовать свой бизнес и с такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 4000 сомони для покупки швейной машинки, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Bunafsha is a very beautiful and hard working woman. She is 21 years old, not married and lives with her parents. From her early years she took a great interest in sewing and tailoring. She sewed different clothes for her dolls and when she grew up, she went to a course in sewing and tailoring. Currently she sews women's clothing. 

Bunafsha plans to start her own business. With this aim she attended the course "Bring it on", organized by the Association of Business Women, and she received a certificate. Currently she could very well start a business and become successful in this area. She requests a loan in the amount of 4,000 somoni for the purchase of a sewing machine, in order to set up her new business. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine for setting up a business

loans.name: Hashhuu

texts.en: Mr. Hashhuu is 42 years old and lives with his wife and 3 children in Ger in the Hovd province of Mongolia. His wife works at the local market as a salesperson. His 19-year-old daughter, Byambatsetseg, is a university student, and his two sons, Byamba-Od and Munhtsooj, ages 14 and 11, are secondary school students. He has been working as a woodworker for a private company since 2001. He has a lot of experience in the furniture manufacturing business, and now he is planning to start his own furniture manufacturing business at home. He requested 3,500,000 MNT to purchase equipment, tools and wooden materials to manufacture furniture. He is a talkative and welcoming person.

loans.use: to purchase equipment, tools and wooden materials to manufacture furniture

loans.name: Carmen Relinda

texts.es: La Sra Carmen de 51 años, tiene 04 hijos, 02 de ellos aún dependientes. Empezó su negocio de comida y golosinas en la zona de Matucana, hace muchos años. Viendo la necesidad de obtener mayores ingresos se traslado a la ciudad donde logro conseguir un stand y empezó un nuevo negocio de la venta de  bisutería y lencería, la cual trabaja  con una de sus hijas. Carmen nos comenta que  obtiene buenas ventas en su negocio. Gracias a ello ha podido apoyar a su pareja con los gastos del hogar. Seguir implementando su  negocio es su mayor deseo. Su último crédito lo destinará para la compra de lencería y bisutería. Esta agradecida con los inversionistas Kiva por la ayuda brindada ya que hace posible su progreso.
texts.en:
Carmen is 51 years old. She has 4 children, 2 of whom still depend on her. Several years ago, she started her business selling food and candy in the Matucana area. Realizing that she needed to increase her income, she moved to the city; there, she was able to secure a stand and started a new business, selling lingerie and jewelry. One of her daughters works with her.
Carmen tells us that her business is generating good sales. Thanks to her business, she has been able to help her partner with household expenses. Her greatest wish is to continue to grow her business. She intends to use this loan to purchase lingerie and jewelry. She is grateful to Kiva investors for the help they have given her, as it has allowed her to progress.

loans.use: to purchase lingerie and jewelry.

loans.name: Eva Paulina

texts.es:
La señora Eva Paulina esta soltera, tiene 22 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, se dedica a la tejeduría de cortes típicos, inicio este negocio siendo operaria para otro negocio, hasta el momento lleva 3 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos de diferentes colores, así puede aumentar su producción y tener un negocio propio, espera en el futuro tener un capital propios y con varios clientes.
texts.en:
Señora Eva Paulina is single and 22. She did not have the opportunity to study. She knits traditional garments. She started this work while she was working for another business and currently has three years' experience.
She is requesting a loan which she will use for the purchase of yarn of various colours. This way, she will be able to increase her production and have her own business. She hopes to have her own capital in the future and to have many clients.

loans.use: to buy yarn for kintting.

loans.name: Los Tres Amigos Group

texts.es: Don Román es miembro del Grupo Solidario Los Tres Amigos, tiene 61 años de edad, es casado y tiene seis hijos, su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, es una familia responsable y trabajadora. El negocio lo aprendió desde muy pequeño cuando trabajo en una tienda vendiendo ropa, después de un tiempo decidió poner su propia tienda de venta de ropa interior, luego fue adquiriendo experiencia y se dispuso a vender también fardos de ropa usada al por mayor y menor, actualmente se dedica a la venta de fardos y ropa interior. Desde hace 40 años se dedica a este negocio, el trabaja en conjunto con su hija, ella es quien le administra el negocio mientras don Román sale a repartir el producto a las tiendas, su horario de atención inicia por las mañanas de 7:00 a.m. y culmina como a las 5:00 p.m. La única desventaja es porque tiene que pagar alquiler de local. Don Román gracias a Dios es una persona sana, muy jovial, amable y muy conocida por sus vecinos. El solicita este préstamo para comprar ropa interior nueva. Con el apoyo de este préstamo podrá llamar la atención de más clientes y seguirá teniendo una actividad económica que le permita cubrir sus gastos. Su sueño es tener su local propio y surtir bien su negocio. Este es el tercer financiamiento que obtiene don Román en FAMA y hasta el momento ha cumplido puntualmente con el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Don Román is a member of the Los Tres Amigos ("the three friends") solidarity group. He is 61, married, and has six children. His wife does the housework. Theirs is a responsible and hard-working family. He learned his business at a young age working in a clothing store. After some time, he decided to open his own underwear store. He began acquiring experience and also started to sell bundles of used clothing, wholesale and retail. He now sells underwear and bundles of clothing. He has had this business for 40 years. He works with his daughter; she runs the business while he goes out to distribute stock to the stores. The store opens at 7:00 am and closes at 5:00 pm. The only disadvantage is having to pay the rent on his storefront. 
This loan will allow him to draw in more customers and to keep having a business to cover his costs. His dream is to have his own storefront and to stock his business well. This is his third loan from FAMA, and he has payed off his quotas punctually so far.

loans.use: to buy underwear.

loans.name: Rustamjon

texts.ru: Рустамджону 28 лет. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами 1 год назад он начал свой бизнес услугой таксиста. Его эффективность помогает ему быть успешным в бизнесе. Он имеет большой круг клиентов, так как делает индивидуальный подход каждому клиенту. Рустамджон работает 26-28 дней в месяц. Еще он работает поставщиком в мебельном магазине и таким образом зарабатывает дополнительный доход. Рустамджон собирается купить новую машину, но не имеет достаточного средства для этого. Он запрашивает займ на сумму  3000 сомони для покупки машины. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Rustamjon is 28 years old. He is married and raising two children. In order to provide his family with all necessary means, he started his business of providing a taxi service 1 year ago. His efficiency helps him to be successful in the business. He has a large customer base, as he gives individual treatment to each client. 

Rustamjon works 26-28 days per month. In addition, he works as a distributor at a furniture store, and this way earns additional income. Rustamjon is going to purchase a new car, but he does not have sufficient funds for this. He requests a loan in the amount of 3,000 somoni for the purchase of a car. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase a car

loans.name: Kuña Joaju Group

texts.es:
kuña Joaju tienen 15 integrantes, en donde todas ellas se esfuerzan por salir adelante y ayudar a sus familias por medio de ese trabajo. Ellas son mujeres jefas de familia que dan todo lo que pueden a sus hijos.
Benancia es miembro de este grupo, ella vende remedios naturales de todo tipo, y es un trabajo duro, según nos comenta, pero gracias a este trabajo ella está saliendo adelante y puede ayudar a toda su familia, le gustaría el día de mañana tener un gran local y seguir ofreciendo buena variedad a sus clientes.
Solicita de este crédito para poder comprar más remedios yuyos naturales y de esa forma seguir dando a sus clientes buena variedad.
texts.en:
The communal bank Kuña Joaju has fifteen members.  All of them work hard to get ahead and help their families through their work.  They are all mothers who give all that they can to their children. 
Benancia is a member of this communal bank.  She sells all manner of natural remedies.  It is hard work, she says, but thanks to this type of work she is getting ahead and can help her entire family.  She would like, soon, to have a large store and keep offering a nice variety of products to her customers. 
Benancia is requesting the loan in order to purchase more natural herbal remedies.  This way she can keep giving her customers a good variety.

loans.use: to purchase herbs to re-sell.

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en:
Naomi is 40 years old and married with four children.

Naomi is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Naomi requested a PHP 19000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Naomi has been raising pigs for 10 years, has borrowed 14 times in the past from NWTF, and more recently, from Kiva, to sustain her business.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pig-raising business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her school fees for the semester.

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon works hard to support her family. She is married, and has a buy and sell charcoal business in the Philippines.

Corazon requested a loan of PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.  She has been in this business for seven years.

In the future, Corazon would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Manana

texts.en:
Manana is 62 years old. She lives with her mother-in-law in the Tskaltubo district. 

Manana and her mother-in-law are provided with retirement pension. But the main source of income for the family is agriculture. They have a small dairy farm consisting of 2 milk cows, and produce traditional Georgian cheese. Manana always has cheese clients, because she produces quality cheese. She works hard to have some savings, and improve the living conditions for the family.

Manana requested a loan to purchase an additional milk cow. It will allow her to receive more milk and produce more cheese to increase the family income.

Manana will use the increased income to improve her living conditions, and equip her house with new household items. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow to produce the cheese she sells.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 62 years old and married with three children.

Nenita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a variety store in the Philippines and requested a loan of PHP 17,000 through NWTF to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell at her store.

Nenita has been in this business for eleven years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Nenita aspires to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Donisa

texts.en:
Donisa is a 29-year-old married woman and a mother of two young children from Trinidad, Bohol. She is engaged in the rice farming business now. She also runs a sari-sari or variety store selling various goods to the people in her community.
Donisa is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer for the farm and additional stock to sell in her store, such as canned goods, noodles, snack foods, toiletries, etc. With this loan, she will be able to produce a good harvest from the farm, and she can cater to more customers and buyers in her store.
In the future, Donisa hopes to make her business a success and to save money for the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for the farm and additional stock to sell in her store, such as canned goods, noodles, snack foods, toiletries, etc.

loans.name: Gulsara

texts.en: Gulsara is married and has 3 children. She always wanted to provide them with a good education and because her husband’s income is not sufficient to provide the family with a good quality of life, Gulsara decided to start a new animal husbandry business to generate additional income and contribute to her family’s finances. She studied at the course ‘To get ahead’ at a women's organization, and she obtained enough business skills. She is asking for a loan of 1500 TJS to purchase cattle to start her new business. She promises to make her payment on time. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy cattle to start a new animal husbandry business.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling rice grain in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 23,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice grain to sell at her buying and selling rice grain business.

Helen has been in this business for 20 years. Helen earns additional income from raising livestock.

Helen has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Ruben Alonso

texts.es:
Rubén  originario de la comarca Rio Coco, en  las afueras de Estelí, casado, padre de 3 hijos, de oficio agricultor, se dedica a la siembra de banano. Rubén inicio con capital propio, el cual compro una camioneta con el dinero que tenía ahorrado, que  le sirve como un medio de transporte para vender sus productos que comercializa en la misma comarca donde habita, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa, este ha sido su primer negocio, con el que mantiene a su familia. 
 Rubén  solicita el préstamo para la compra de insumo como abonos, fertilizantes para sembrar  banano y  comprar granos básicos para diversificar, ya que el estima que le ayudaría a comprar más productos de calidad  para ofrecerle a sus clientes, sus planes futuros es invertir más en su venta de granos básicos, ya que esto le ayudaría a incrementar sus ganancias, siempre impulsar la siembra de banano y café. Su meta en la vida es poder darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Rubén originates from the Rio Coco district on the outskirts of Estelí. He is married and is the father of three children. He dedicates himself to growing bananas in the agricultural trade. Rubén began with his own capital - a van which he bought with money he had saved. It serves him as a means of transportation to sell his products, which he commercializes in the same district where he lives. He counts on the support of his wife. This has been his first business and it provides for his family.

Rubén is asking for the loan to buy supplies like fertilizers to grow bananas and to buy basic grains to diversify, as he believes it would help him to buy more quality products to offer his clients. His future plans are to invest more in his sales of basic grains because this would help him increase his income by boosting the growth of bananas and coffee. His goal in life it to be able to give a better quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to buy supplies like fertilizers to grow bananas and to buy basic grains.

loans.name: Jose Ilerman

texts.es:
José, vive con sus dos hijos de 7 y 12 años de edad, estos hijos los cuida solo él ya que quedaron a su responsabilidad, él administra un cyber café, tambien el negocio de fotografías al minuto, atiende todos los días, lo tiene en un lugar propio, su ubicación es adecuada, porque esta cerda de un centro escolar.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de accesorios para computadora (mause, teclados), realizara remodelación de la sala de foto estudio, en estas dos actividades esta compartida la inversión del préstamo,  el préstamo será un aporte necesario ya que se acercan las graduaciones de los estudiantes y hay más demanda de fotografías, al igual la demanda en el Cyber.
Su aspiración es tener más clientes, ofrecer un buen servicio, incrementar sus ganancias ya que así podrá ayudar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
José lives with his 2 children who are 7 and 12 years old. He cares for these children alone as they were left in his care. He runs an internet cafe. He also attends to his photography business every dat. He has it in his own place. Its location is adequate, because it is close to the school center.
He is requesting a loan to purchase computer accessories (mouse, keyboards). He will also remodel his photo studio. These two activities make up the investment of the loan. The loan will be will be necessary assistance as student graduations are already approaching and there is more demand for photos, as well as demand in the internet cafe.
His aspiration is to have more clients, offer a good service, and grow his income so that he will be able to help his children.

loans.use: to buy computer accessories: mouse, keyboards.

loans.name: Rosamyrna

texts.en:
Rosamyrna is a 62-year-old woman from Trinidad, Bohol. She runs a sari-sari or variety store. This is the source of her income.

Rosamyrna is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell in her store, such as dry goods, canned goods, candies, snack foods, soap, etc. Through this loan, she could improve her sales and profit.

In the future, Rosamyrna wants to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her store, such as dry goods, canned goods, candies, snack foods, soap, etc.

loans.name: Rozilmo

texts.ru: Розилмо является одним из таких личностей, которая старается улучшить условия жизни и стимулировать экономическое состояние семьи. Она замужем, 56 лет и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Ее муж работает  учителем в средней школе  и получает маленькую зарплату. Ее старшие дети тоже работают, но их доход не хватает для обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами. Розилмо решила помочь мужу и детям для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес купле продажей овощей на местном рынке, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своих детей и внуков с хорошим образованием и высококалорийными продуктами питания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2500 сомони для покупки товара, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Rozilmo is one of these individuals who try to improve living conditions and stimulate the economic conditions of their family. She is married, 56 years old, and she is raising three children. Her husband works as a teacher in high school and receives a small pay. Her oldest children also work, but their income is not sufficient to provide the family with all necessary means. 

Rozilmo decided to help her husband and children for the family's benefit. With this aim she attended the course "Bring It On", organized by the Association for Business Women, and she received a certificate. Now she may start her own business and become successful in this area. 

Rozilmo would like to set up a business of buying and selling vegetables at the local market, as she has experience in this type of business. She plans to use the income received to provide her children and grandchildren with a good education and hearty food. She requests a loan in the amount of 2,500 somoni for the purchase of food products in order to set up the new business. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables for setting up a business

loans.name: Santos Matilde

texts.es:
El señor Santos Matilde esta soltero, tiene 19 años de edad, estudio los estudio de secundaria con profesión maestra de educacion, pero no tiene trabajo en su campo de profesión, se dedica a la tejeduría de cortes típicos, inicio aprendiendo con sus padres, hasta el momento lleva 4 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos de diferentes colores para hacer tejidos y poderlos vender para tener ganancias, espera ser un buen administrador de su negocio y tener empleados.
texts.en:
Santos Matilde is single, 19, and in secondary school studied teaching as a profession, but he does not work in his professional field. He works weaving typical cuts of fabric. He began by learning with his parents, and so far he has four years of experience.

He is requesting the loan to be used to purchase different colors of yarn to make weavings and be able to sell them to make a profit. He hopes to be a good business administrator and have employees.

loans.use: to buy yarn for weaving

loans.name: Nyamhuu

texts.en: Mr. Nyamhuu is 36 years old and lives with his wife and 2 children in a house in the Sukhbaatar district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. His 32-year-old wife, Tsetsegmaa, works with him in their cattle farm. His 2 children, Damdinsharav and Avirmed, ages 6 and 3, stay home with their grandparents during the day. He started his business of cattle farming and producing and selling organic dairy products in 2008. He has been producing and providing organic dairy products to local customers, and he is famous in the area for his organic dairy products. He is preparing for the harsh Mongolian winter by purchasing forage for his cattle to keep the dairy product production going during the winter. He is requesting 6,000,000 MNT to purchase bulk forage to feed his cattle during the harsh cold winter of Mongolia. He is a hardworking and optimistic person.

loans.use: to purchase bulk forage to feed his cattle during the harsh cold winter of Mongolia.

loans.name: Asmahan

texts.en:
Asmahan is a 45-year-old illiterate woman who looks after her family of 5. 

Being an illiterate woman has not given her a lot of chances to find jobs that could help in supporting the family, so she started a small retail business at home, selling blankets that she gets from wholesale markets.  

Asmahan has applied for this loan in order to get more blankets and bed covers to sell to increase her profits.

loans.use: to get more blankets and bed covers to resell.

loans.name: Frenny Pearl

texts.en:
Frenny Pearl is 20 years old, married with one child. 

Frenny Pearl is in the agricultural business, raising hogs in the Philippines. Frenny Pearl requested a loan of PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Frenny Pearl has been hog-raising for two years and has borrowed twice in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

In the future, Frenny Pearl would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is a married lady, 23 years old, with 3 children ages 6, 3 and 3 months.  She has been running a retail shop for seven years, earning a monthly income of KES. 10,000.  

She has obtained a loan of KES. 45,000 from KADET LTD; this is her second loan.  After successfully repaying the previous loan, she wishes to purchase fresh bread, sugar, salt, and washing soaps to sell.

The profits earned will be used to improve the living standards of her family. She hopes for a better living.

loans.use: To purchase fresh bread, sugar, salt, and washing soaps for her retail shop.

loans.name: Razia

texts.en: Ms. Razia is a 35-year-old married woman and a mother of six children. She has been a seamstress for 10 years. It was very difficult for her to feed her children when her husband was struggling hard to earn bread and butter for his family. Razia’s husband could not earn enough to survive as he is employed as a security guard. This compelled her to start stitching for the people living in her community. She works hard both day and night to make her work famous so she may be able to provide food for her family. Owing to the good quality of her work, she receives many orders from her customers on a regular basis. To complete her orders on time she requested a loan of Rs 20,000 to purchase raw materials, such as spools of thread and packs of buttons, laces and zippers in various colors. This will improve her earnings and enable her to better support the needs of her family members.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials, such as spools of thread and packs of buttons, laces and zippers in various colors.

loans.name: Lucille

texts.en:
Lucille is a 33-year-old married woman and the mother of two young children from San Miguel, Bohol. She has been engaged in a hog raising business for more than two years now.

Lucille hopes to make her business a success. She is asking for a loan to buy additional piglets to raise and also feed for the pigs. With this loan, Lucille will be able to grow healthy pigs.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise and also feed for the pigs

loans.name: Shefa

texts.en:
Shefa is a 28-year-old young woman. She is married and a mother to one son and four daughters. Her husband works in a barber shop in the village where they live. His low salary is not enough to cover all of the family's needs.

For the past two years, Shefa has had a small sewing workshop in her house where she sews clothes for customers. This has been a profitable project, but it needs additional support to cover the cost of new equipment.

Shefa is requesting a USD youth loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing a new sewing machine to provide better quality to her loyal customers. This will increase sales and improve Shefa's income, so that she will live with her family in better conditions.

Shefa is pictured here while she is sewing clothes.

loans.use: To purchase a new sewing machine

loans.name: Sauda

texts.ru: Сауда молодая и целеустремленная девушка. Ей 18 лет, не замужем и живет с родителями. Она шьет очень красивые женские платья и планирует использовать свое ремесло для получения дохода. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес шитьем женской одежды, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3800 сомони для покупки швейной машинки, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Sauda is a young and purposeful woman. She is 18 years old, not married, and she lives with her parents. She sews very beautiful women's dresses and plans to use this craft for receiving income. With this aim she attended the course "Bring It On", organized by the Association of Business Women, and she received a certificate. Now she may start her own business and become successful in this area. 

Sauda would like to organize a business of sewing women's clothing, as she has experience in this type of business. She requests a loan in the amount of 3,800 somoni for the purchase of a sewing machine, in order to organize her new business. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To purchase a sewing machine for setting up a business

loans.name: Felipe De Jesus

texts.es:
Felipe tiene la edad de 64 años de edad, soltero, padre de 2 hijos, entre las edades de 12 y 15 años respectivamente, de oficio carpintero, con conocimientos. Él dice  que inicio trabajando desde muy pequeño en carpintería, y luego con las ganancias que obtuvo de su trabajo, comenzó a comprar herramientas, y fue allí que decidió poner su propio taller de carpintería, para independizarse. Él no cuenta con otros ingresos solo los que le genera su negocio, de esta manera le gustaría dar a conocer  sus muebles como mesas, gabinetes, roperos, y sillas en las casas comerciales de otros departamentos, sus expectativas es seguir creciendo en su negocio y promover sus conocimientos en muebles, para ofrecer a sus clientes un producto de calidad.
Felipe está solicitando el crédito para comprar toda la materia prima que necesita como madera,  pintura, lija, barniz y pegamento etc. ya que el estima que le ayudaría en poder comprar todos los materiales que necesita en su taller, para la elaboración de sus muebles, sus planes futuros es ampliar y mejorar su taller para tener mejor oportunidad crecimiento en su negocio.
texts.en:
Felipe is 46 years old, single, and the father of two children who are 12 and 15 years old respectively. He works as an experienced carpenter by trade. He says he began his work in carpentry when he was very little, and later began to buy tools with the earnings he gained from his work. This was how he decided to make his own carpentry workshop and become independent. He does not have other income, only what his business generates, so he would like to publicize his furniture such as tables, cabinets, wardrobes, and seats in commercial houses from other areas. His expectation is to continue developing his business and to promote his knowledge of furniture to offer his clients a quality product. 

Felipe is asking for this loan to buy all of the raw materials he needs, such as  wood, paint, sandpaper, varnish, glue, etc. He believes this will help him be able to buy all of the materials he needs in his workshop to produce his furniture. His future plans are to expand and improve his workshop to have a better opportunity for expanding his business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials: wood, paint, sandpaper, varnish, glue, etc.

loans.name: Josphat

texts.en:
Josphat is a married man aged 32 who supports a family of 3 members. His two children are aged 11 and five years old. He practices dairy farming and has been in operation for a period of 13 years, earning an income of KES 12,000.

He has borrowed his seventh loan of KES 40,000 from KADET LTD after repaying the previous loans successfully and intends to purchase a dairy cow.  

The anticipated profits will be used to plough back to his dairy farm. He hopes for prosperity.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Irma Del Carmen

texts.es:
Irma originaria de Estelí, con 52 años de edad, madre de 4 hijos, de oficio comerciante. Ella cuenta que inicio con capital propio, dinero que obtuvo vendiendo nacatamal y verduras, luego con el dinero que fue ahorrando, decidió poner su propio negocio. Actualmente  es dueña de una pulpería de la que es propietaria hace 2 años. Ella cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo, le gustaría comercializar sus productos en  el mismo vecindario, su expectativa es  incrementar sus ventas para obtener mejores ganancias.
Irma está solicitando el préstamo para comprar granos básicos como arroz, azúcar, frijoles, aceite, snacks, etc. Ya que su objetivo es incrementar sus ventas al tener más productos en inventarios y poder ofrecer más variedad de productos a sus clientes, sus planes futuros son ampliar su pulpería para obtener mayores ganancias y   poder comprar una vitrina en donde pueda  exhibir sus productos.
texts.en:
Irma is a native of Estelí.  She is 52 years old, the mother of four children and a retailer.  She says that she started her business with her own capital, which she earned selling "nacatamal" (steamed meat and vegetable pasty, cooked in banana or maize leaves) and vegetables.  With the money that she saved, she decided to open her own business.  She is currently the owner of a small grocery, which she has run for the last two years.  Irma has her husband's support.  She would like to sell her products in her neighborhood.  She expects to increase her sales and earn a better income. 
Irma is requesting the loan in order to purchase basic food items like rice, sugar, beans, cooking oils, snacks, etc.  Since her objective is to increase her sales once she has more products in her inventory and to offer a greater variety of products to her customers, her future plans are to expand her grocery to earn a larger income and to purchase a display case for her products.

loans.use: to purchase basic food items like rice, sugar, beans, cooking oil, snacks, etc.

loans.name: Manal

texts.en: After getting her previous loan, Manal bought more clothing items and started selling school stationery and toys for kids. Her husband helps her in distributing the goods when someone asks for a specific order. Today she has applied for another loan, in order to increase the quantity of goods she has for sale.

loans.use: to increase the quantity of goods she has for sale.

loans.name: Santos Delfino

texts.es:
El señor Santos Delfino esta casado, tiene 33 años de edad, tiene 4 hijos 2 de los cuales estan estudiando, curso los estudios de secundaria, como maestro de música, lleva 5 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien es locutora de radio.

Solicita un préstamo para pagar un teclado musical que va comprar, para poder atender mejor en su academia de música, espera seguir superándose en su profesión y en el futuro trabajar para una empresa grande de música.
texts.en:
Santos Delfino is married, 33 years old, and has four children, two of whom are studying in high school. He is a music teacher with five years of experience and the support of his wife, who is a radio announcer.

His is asking for a loan to pay for a musical keyboard that he is going to buy so he will be able to better attend to his music academy. He hopes to continue rising in his profession and to work with a big music business in the future.

loans.use: to buy a musical keyboard

loans.name: Juna

texts.en:
Juna is 31 years old and she is from the small village of Kaspi district.

Juna lives with her husband and mother-in-law, who is provided with a retirement pension. The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have pigs. Juna is involved in meat trading. She buys cows, slaughters them, and then sells the meat in the nearby villages. 

Juna is a very hardworking, responsible person with a lot of experience in this business. She requested a loan for purchasing additional cows. After buying additional cows, she will expand her meat business. She will purchase more cows and sell more meat at a good price. She will increase her trade capital and make her business more profitable. With this plan, the living conditions of the family will improve.

loans.use: to purchase cattle for slaughtering.

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.en:
Lilibeth is 46 years old, married, and has two children.

Lilibeth works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari (convenience) store in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan from NWTF, to buy items like rice and other groceries to sell in her sari-sari store. She has been in this business for six years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Lilibeth aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items like rice and other groceries, to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Sawsan

texts.en:
After receiving her previous loan, Sawsan bought more beads and fabric and started making new items, such as wall hangings, other than embroidering clothes. She used the same process in making the clothes in making hanging walls using threads and beads. 

Sawsan is requesting another loan to buy more colorful beads in different sizes and shapes and some colorful fabric.

loans.use: to purchase more colorful beads.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale, so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Nana

texts.en:
Nana is from the Martvili district. She is 42 years old, a single woman who lives with her cousin. The family earns their living through an agricultural business. 

Nana owns three greenhouses where dahlias are grown. Nana has her own store in the center of the village and sells dahlias locally. In addition, the family runs a small dairy farm with 2 milk cows whose milk is used in cheese products. The cheese is sold at the local open market.

Nana requested a loan to purchase rose saplings to grow in her greenhouse, as roses are very popular and the demand is high. Nana will sell the harvested roses in her store; this will increase the monthly income of the family. 

With the increased income, Nana will improve the living conditions of the family. She awaits your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase rose saplings for her greenhouse.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Pamela

texts.en:
Pamela is 50 years old, married, and has four children. She describes herself as hard working. She operates a poultry business where she sells eggs and chickens. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in a highly populated area and her primary customers are local residents. In addition, Pamela sells vegetables and fruits to customers, which increases her business income.

Pamela is requesting her second loan from SMEP DTM for 40,000 KES, which she will use to buy chickens to sell.  She describes her biggest business challenge to be the high price of chickens.  Her business goal is to improve her business within five years.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en: This time, unlike her past four years, Rosalina is applying for a loan of Php 16000 to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs. The general store business that she previously funded through NWTF,  Kiva's partner, continues and helps Rosalina and her family to increase income and improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Malika

texts.ru: Малика жительница города Истаравшан. Ей 28 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Малика открыла аптеку в районе Зафаробод. Она фармацевт по специальности. В этой области Малика работает два года. Она берет кредит для приобретения антибиотиков и других необходимых противовоспалительных препаратов.
texts.en:
Malika is a resident of the city of Istaravshan. She is 28 years old and married. She has three children. 

Malika opened a pharmacy in the region of Zafarobod. She is a pharmacist by profession. Malika has worked in this area for two years. She takes a loan for the purchase of antibiotics and other necessary anti-inflammatory drugs.

loans.use: to purchase antibiotics and other necessary anti-inflammatory drugs

loans.name: Ana Basilia

texts.es:
La señora Ana es acompañada tiene cinco hijos menores los que están en edad escolar a los que tiene el deber de mantener los estudios, se dedica a su negocio en el mercado de Chinandega en el sector madera desde hace 25 años.
Desde que inicio el negocio la señora  se ha caracterizado por ser una señora muy luchadora y emprendedora ya que su negocio lo inicio con poca mercadería y con mucho esfuerzo  ha salido adelante manteniendo su núcleo familiar, una de las dificultades que atraviesa la señora  es comprar mercadería para su negocio como artesanía en general, batellas, tajaderos es por eso que llego a Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un financiamiento que le permita comprar la mercadería y poder mantener los ingresos los cuales le ayudan a mantener su núcleo familiar  y la educación de sus hijos.
Cabe señalar que la señora  desde que trabaja con Ceprodel su negocio ha incrementado bastante  y su calidad de vida ha mejorado.
texts.en:
Ana has five young, school-aged children, and has the duty of providing for their studies. She has dedicated herself to her business in the wood sector of the Chinandega market for the past 25 years.

Since she began her business, she has been characterized as a fighter of a woman as well as enterprising because she began her business with little merchandise and a lot of effort. She has managed to move forward and to support her core family. One of the difficulties she faces is buying merchandise for her business, such as general artisanry, small boats, and pitchers. For this reason, she came Ceprodel to receive financing that permits her to buy merchandise and be able to maintain her income which supports her family and her children's education.

It should be noted that since working with Ceprodel, her business has grown quite a bit and her quality of life has improved.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business like small boats, pitchers, and artisanry.

loans.name: Marhabo

texts.ru: Мархабо проживает в районе Зафаробод, недалеко от города Истаравшан. Ей 33 года. Она живет с матерью, отцом и сестрой. Мархабо занимается скотоводством. Она разводит крупнорогатый скот для продажи. Этим видом деятельности она занимается пять лет. Мархабо берет кредит для закупа бычков и коров.
texts.en:
Marhabo lives in the region Zafarobod, not far from the city of Istaravshan. She is 33 years old. She lives with her mother, father and sister. 

Marhabo is engaged in livestock breeding. She breeds cattle for selling. She has been engaged in this type of activity for five years. Marhabo takes a loan for the purchase of bulls and cows.

loans.use: to purchase bulls and cows

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a loom

loans.name: Hafiza

texts.ru: Хафизе  20 лет. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. Она очень целеустремленная и трудолюбивая девушка. Она умеет шить женские одежды и хочет использовать свое ремесло для получения дохода. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес услугой портнихи. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки швейной машинки, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Hafiza is 20 years old. She is not married, and she lives with her parents. She is a very purposeful and hard working young woman. She knows how to sew women's clothing and would like to use her craft for receiving an income.
