He is going to use the loan he is requesting from Ceprodel to pay for the graduation expenses of his son, since he is graduating from secondary school, as well as to pay the pre-matriculation fees to enter college and buy school supplies.

Lázaro says that he is happy with the support that Kiva and Ceprodel are providing to him, since through it he can provide his children with full support and a right to education.

loans.use: pay for his son's graduation expenses and pre-matriculation fees

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en: Vivian lives in the coastal region of Kenya, in the town of Msambweni. She is 27 years old and is single.  She has a two year-old son. She is a fighter who has the zeal to get ahead in life. Vivian is one of the few young women who do not fear challenges. She believes that hard work pays, and she knows that her efforts will not go unrewarded. She is currently running a food stall that is located in the market. Vivian is seeking a loan to buy ingredients for preparing foods.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for preparing foods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Sidney

texts.es: Saludos desde Perú, Sidney es una estudiante de 25 años, es soltera. Ella se educa en un Instituto de Nivel Superior y ejerce la carrera de Diseño Gráfico. Ella es muy carismática y extrovertida, lo cual le ayuda a desenvolverse mejor como persona. Sidney trabaja de forma independientemente sobre su carrera. Además nos comenta que utilizara el préstamo para poder solventar los gastos de sus pensiones del Instituto y así poder estudiar con tranquilidad y ahínco. Ella agradece a todas las personas que a través de instituciones como KIVA y Edaprospo la ayudan a poder seguir estudiando y promete esforzarse cada día más para lograr ser una gran profesional de éxito.
texts.en: Greetings from Peru! Sidney is a 25-year-old single student.  She attends the Instituto de Nivel Superior [Upper Level Institute] and she is majoring in graphic design.  She is very charismatic and outgoing, which helps her develop better as a person.  Sidney works independently on her career.  Also she comments that she will use the loan to be able to pay her Institute tuition expenses and to be able to be able to study in peace and with zeal.  She thanks all the people who, through Kiva and EDAPROSPO, help her to be able to continue studying and she promises to strive more each day to achieve being a successful professional.

loans.use: to pay her tuition.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is 31 years old.  She is a business lady who owns a grocery store. She is married and has been blessed with two children who are both in school. She has been in business for three years and also earns an income through farming. She is very responsible and hardworking  because she has to provide for her family. 
She hopes to expand her business, and she requires a loan of 68,799.38 KES to buy vegetables, onions, potatoes and tomatoes.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, onions, potatoes and tomatoes

loans.name: Luis Walter

texts.es:
Luis Walter tiene 39 años de edad es casado tiene 4 hijos vive con los hijos y la esposa en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante da la VRC JERUSALEN, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto el Caimito I, perteneciente a la parroquia Puerto Pechiche Cantón pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol Gandul. 

Luis Walter se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz,  arroz. Solicita el crédito para comprar insecticidas, urea, líquido mata maleza, abonos. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los fertilizantes para las siembras.   
Las compras las realizará en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y el mal clima. 

El sueño es comprarse una finca. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar indor. "Esta muy agradecido por el crédito anterior porque le ha servido de mucho".
texts.en:
Luis Walter is 39 years old and is married with four sons. He lives with his wife and children in Ventanas in Los Ríos Province. 

He is a member of the JERUSALEN community bank, located in Caimito I district, in the Puerto Pechiche parish of Pueblo Viejo Canton. The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Luis Walter makes his living in agriculture, growing corn and rice. He is requesting a loan to buy pesticides, urea, liquid weed-killer and fertilizers. 

With the help of this loan, he will be able to buy fertilizers for his crops. He will buy the products he needs in the city of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.
The challenges he faces are pests and bad weather. 

His dream is to buy a farm. In his free time he enjoys playing indoor soccer. He is very grateful for the previous loan because it has served him well.

loans.use: to buy pesticides, urea, liquid weed-killer and fertilizers.
